content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

1->2->4->12->3

Note: This is the shortest path from node 11 to node 3 in the provided graph. The path may contain any number of intermediate nodes, but in this case, the shortest path includes only one intermediate node (node 4).

1->2->12->3

Note: This is the shortest path from node 11 to node 3 in the provided graph. The path may contain any number of intermediate nodes, but in this case, the shortest path includes only two intermediate nodes (nodes 2 and 12).
